item.title: @elonmusk: Two years ago, a British woman, distraught over the murder of 3 little girls, tweeted that she didn'...
item.description: Two years ago, a British woman, distraught over the murder of 3 little girls, tweeted that she didn't care if migrant hotels burned. Then she deleted it. She got 31 months in prison. Yesterday, Britain's leaders gave a hero's welcome and citizenship to an Egyptian man who's tweeted his desire to kill Jews, denied the Holocaust happened, called English people 'dogs & monkeys', said police should be killed and that white people are a 'blight' that needs to be wiped out by genocide. Never deleted any of it. I know we in the US have a lot of our own problems, too, but Britain has gone completely nuts. Do these politicians have any idea how insane this all looks to the rest of the world?

item.title: @elonmusk: Still no coverage in NYT, WaPo, CNN, or Minneapolis Star-Tribune of massive fraud being uncovered in...
item.description: Still no coverage in NYT, WaPo, CNN, or Minneapolis Star-Tribune of massive fraud being uncovered in Minnesota. The media's willingness to ignore stories that hurt Democrats is truly astonishing.

item.title: @elonmusk: You'll find thousands of articles mentioning "Trump targeting Somalis" and how "vulnerable" they are...
item.description: You'll find thousands of articles mentioning "Trump targeting Somalis" and how "vulnerable" they are But literally zero articles about the actual Somali daycare fraud happening in broad daylight....the one that's been draining taxpayer money for years Why aren't they writing about the real story? Why is no one asking: ‚Ä¢ Where did that money go? ‚Ä¢ Why is the media protecting the fraudsters? ‚Ä¢ Why are they actively covering this up? I seriously don't understand how every outlet is collectively trying to bury this

item.title: @elonmusk: X is proud to support the legal case of Michelle Evans. Ms. Evans faces potential criminal charges f...
item.description: X is proud to support the legal case of Michelle Evans. Ms. Evans faces potential criminal charges for reposting a picture of a male transgender activist using the sink to wash his hands in the women‚Äôs restroom in the Texas State Capitol in May 2023. Ms. Evans did not even take the photo. She merely posted it on X as part of political commentary on transgender issues. Yet, shortly after, the Travis County District Attorney launched a criminal investigation into her post. The First Amendment protects Ms. Evans' speech, yet in a 2-1 vote, the Fifth Circuit Court of Appeals issued a misguided and dangerous opinion allowing the criminal investigation to go forward. X is therefore assisting Ms. Evans in pursuing an appeal before all 17 judges of the Fifth Circuit. We look forward to the full Fifth Circuit correcting this wrong and preserving free speech, which is the foundation of American democracy.

item.title: @elonmusk: Waymo does not respond to sirens from police cars or firetruck. However, Tesla vehicles respond to t...
item.description: Waymo does not respond to sirens from police cars or firetruck. However, Tesla vehicles respond to those sirens and stop the vehicle on the shoulder. We have seen these things through many videos. Tesla is the only vehicle that understands the real world best.

item.title: @elonmusk: Good to know I‚Äôve been slaving away for 2+ decades ‚Ä¶ taking on 100% of the bankruptcy risk, litigati...
item.description: Good to know I‚Äôve been slaving away for 2+ decades ‚Ä¶ taking on 100% of the bankruptcy risk, litigation risk, tax risk, audit risk, With all the daily headaches of matters of: ‚Ä¢employment, ‚Ä¢sales, ‚Ä¢accounting, ‚Ä¢legal, ‚Ä¢insurance, ‚Ä¢software, ‚Ä¢vendors, ‚Ä¢platforms, to form and run a law-abiding business, to earn a mediocre income, that I‚Äôve created from 0 to 1, entirely by myself, bootstrapped out of my own savings, which has provided hundreds of jobs and livelihoods to employees and contractors that have touched our circle‚Ä¶. when all along I could‚Äôve simply ‚Ä¢created a shell corporation ‚Ä¢with misspelled signage, ‚Ä¢locked doors, ‚Ä¢blacked out windows, ‚Ä¢took in millions in fraudulent revenue, ‚Ä¢payable 100% to me, never having to work an honest day, never improving the community around me, never benefiting others all in exchange for my vote. Sham. And shame. Everyone should be outraged because there‚Äôs 100% chance this is happening in your state too and everyone playing by the rules is getting rag dolled by a system that lies, cheats, steals from the builders and providers to *give* to those that can leverage that payoff into a vote.

item.title: @elonmusk: The fraud of your taxpayer money is happening nationwide and is liberally applied to attract illegal...
item.description: The fraud of your taxpayer money is happening nationwide and is liberally applied to attract illegal (and some legal) immigrants who will reliably vote Democrat. The more you look, the more you find. And you don‚Äôt need to be a world-class detective to figure it out. This is brazen, daylight robbery.

item.title: @elonmusk: Even requiring a tiny amount of work for fraudulent payments would have a massive positive effect. T...
item.description: Even requiring a tiny amount of work for fraudulent payments would have a massive positive effect. That‚Äôs how insanely awful the level of fraud actually is!
